name: Draitron Fafnir
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Draitron" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, except "Draitron Fafnir". The effects of Ritual Spell Cards and their activation cannot be negated. Once per turn, if a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned face-up while you control a "Draitron" monster: You can decrease the Levels of those face-up Summoned monsters by 1 for every 1000 ATK they have (min. 1), for the rest of this turn. You can only activate 1 "Draitron Fafnir" per turn.
